meanings.definition: Engaged in an activity or process regularly or repeatedly.
meanings.sent1: She is a practicing artist, creating new paintings every day.
meanings.sent2: The team consists of practicing musicians who perform at local events.
meanings.sent3: The practicing chef always experiments with new recipes in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her practicing dedication to yoga has brought her inner peace.
meanings.sent5: The practicing gardener tends to her plants with care and attention.

meanings.definition: Rehearsing a skill or activity in order to improve or maintain proficiency.
meanings.sent1: He is practicing his speech for the school play in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent2: The band is practicing for their upcoming concert in the garage.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to be practicing its hunting skills on the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: She is practicing her patience as she waits for the bus in the rain.
meanings.sent5: The students are practicing their multiplication tables to ace the test.
